Chinelo Okparanta (a mụrụ n'afọ 1981) bu onye Naijiria-Amerika bụrụkwa onye ode akwukwo na ode akwụkwọ di nkenke
A mụrụ ya na Port Harcourt, Nigeria, ebe a nọrọ zụlite ya   ruo mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, bụ mgbe ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara United States
Chinelo Okparanta bụ onye a mụrụ na Port Harcourt, nke obodo Naijiria , ma mgbe ọ dị afọ iri, ya na ezinụlọ ya kwagara obodo Amerịka
Ọ gụrụ akwụkwọ n'ụlọ akwụkwọ Pennsylvania State University ( Schreyer Honors College ), Mahadum Rutgers ya na Iowa Writers' Workshop
Okparanta ebipụtala nkenke akụkọ mbipụta nke gụnyere Granta,  New Yorker, Tin House, The Kenyon Review, The Southern Review, TriQuarterly, Njikọ, Subtropics na The Coffin Factory
Edemede ya apụtala na blọgụ nke AGNI,
lọgụ ihe nriteya  Akblọgụ nke ụkọ, na Mahadu, blọọgụ Mmemme Writing International
Okparanta enweela mkpakọrịta ma ọ bụ nkuzidịkaaọkammụta  nleta na Mahadum nke Iowa, Mahadum Colgate, Mahadum Purdue, College City College of New York, na Mahadum Columbia
Ọ bụ ọkammụtarọfesasụsụnbekee ya na nke ide akụkọ ifo l ifo) na Mahadum Bucknell, ebe ọ otu onye n'ime ndị na-eme nyocha na ngalaba bụkwa C
Graydon & Mary E
Rmawbụrụkwa ọkammụta nke odee abụ na ode ihe okike nke  yana Margaret Hollinsheaitinafọ g ruo 2021
Ugbu aosote ọkammụta nrịtasụsụ a nke bekee na onymgbazismemideeihe okike i'ụlọiakwụkwọ ng na Swarthmore College

Nchịkọta nkenke akụkọ so na akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya, Obi Ụtọ, Dị ka Mmiri (Granta Books na Houghton Miffin Harcourt ), bụ nke a gụnyere n'afọ 2013 maka Frank O'Connor International Short Story Award,  ọ ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ n'afọ 2014 maka ihe nrite New York Public Library Young Lions Award,  wee nweta 2014 Lambda Literary Award for Lesbian Fiction

Ahọpụtala ya maka mkpakọrịta ndị nka na United States  ma bụrụ onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ na  Rolex Mentor na Protegé Arts Initiative in Literature n'afọ 2014. Ihe nkwanye ùgwù ndị ọzọ gụnyere ihe nrite Society of Midland Authors  (maka onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ nke afọ 2013),  ihe nrite Caine Prize for African Writing (maka onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ nke afọ 2013), na ihe nrite ndị ọzọ
Nkenke akụkọ ya akpọrọ "Fairness" bụ nke a gụnyere na PEN/O
Henry Prize Akụkọ, n'etiti nkenke akụkọ iri abụọ dị elu nke  afọ 2014
Obi Ụtọ, Dị ka Mmiri bụ ndị nchịkọta akụkọ họrọ maka Nyocha Akwụkwọ New York Times na Septemba 20, 2013

Edepụtara mkpokọta ahụ dị ka otu n'ime akụkọ ifo nke Africa kacha mma nke The Guardian nke afọ 2013,   ekwuputara dị ka onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite Etisalat nke Naijiria maka akwụkwọ edemede n'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2014
Akwụkwọ akụkọ mbụ ya, N'okpuru Osisi Udala, bụ nke ebipụtara na 2015

Onye nyocha New York Times kpọrọ Okparanta “onye ode akwụkwọ mara mma na nke ziri ezi”,  The Guardian (UK) kọwara akwụkwọ ahụ dị ka "akwụkwọ akụkọ na-adọrọ adọrọ banyere nwa agbọghọ nwere mmasị na ụmụ nwaanyị ibe ya tolitere na Naijiria n'oge agha obodo Nigeria
" n'ime nkea "
Okparanta kọwara nke ọma etu a ga-esi nwee nhazi n'etiti akụkọ ịhụnanya na akụkọ agha."
N'okpuru Osisi Udala bụ Nhọrọ Ndị nchịkọta akụkọ Nleba Akwụkwọ New York Times  yana nke ahọpụtara maka ihe nrite Kirkus Reviews gbasara ide akụkụ ifo nke afọ 2015

Otu n'ime NPR 's "Akwụkwọ kacha mma afọ 2015", ọ bụkwa "akwụkwọ" kacha mma" nke Buzzfeed, The Wall Street Journal, The Millions, Bustle, Shelf Awareness, and Publishers Lunch   ma bụrụkwa nke "a kasị atụ anya" ndepụta, n'etiti ndị ọzọ

Edepụtara ya ogologo oge maka ihe nrite Center for Fiction First Novel Prize, nke afọ 2015 họpụtara maka ihe nrite NAACP Image Award n'afọ 2016 maka akwụkwọ akụkọ ifo pụrụ iche ,  a họpụtara ya maka ihe nrite Hurston-Wright Legacy Award n'afọ 2016 nke akụkọ ifo,  onye ruru na agba nke ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite ndị odee Bipụta Triangle  ( Ferro-Grumley Award ),  ọkara ikpeazụ maka ihe nrite VCU Cabell First Novelist Award afọ 2016,  depụtara ogologo oge maka ihe nriteChautauqua Prize nke afọ 2016,  wee nweta ihe nrite 2016 Lambda Literary Award na katigori akụkụ ifo gbasara ndị nwanyị na nwanyi
N'okpuru osisi Udala tụrụ ugo n'afọ 2016 maka ihe nrite na akụkọ ifo nke Jessie Redmon Fauset Award  ma bụrụ nhọrọ afọ 2017 maka Amelia Bloomer Project  American Library Association
N'afọ 2017, Okparanta nwetara ihe nrite nturu ugo nrịbama Triangle nke 2016 Betty Berzon Emerging Writer
N'okpuru osisi Udala bụ nke e depụtara maka  International Dublin Literary Award  nke afọ 2017
Pulse nke Naijiria kpọrọ akwụkwọ a bụ n'okpuru osisi Udala aha dịka otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri pụtara ìhè nke Naijiria maka afọ 2015
YNaija depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ iri kachasị ama ama nke 2015
Afridiaspora depụtara ya dị ka otu n'ime akwụkwọ akụkọ Afrịka kacha mma nke 2015
N'ọnwa nke anọ afọ 2017, Granta họpụtara Okparanta maka otu oge n'ime afọ iri Best of Young American Novelists list
Edemede ya "Trump na klas" ka a gụnyere na anthology New Daughters of Africa, nke Margaret Busby deziri n'afọ 2019
